methodology.triage_approach: Intelligent sampling across all 1801 contacts. Due to file size constraints, full enumeration was not feasible. The analysis focused on: (1) all contacts with 2025 last_contacted dates (37 contacts), (2) all contacts with 2024 last_contacted dates (57 contacts), (3) all contacts with Founder/CEO/CTO positions, and (4) contacts with pre-existing enrichment_data. This covers the highest-probability revenue-adjacent contacts.

scoring_formula.industry_relevance: 0-3 (AI/ML=3, ESG=2.5, Travel/Tourism=2.5, Events=2, Security=2, Finance/VC=2, Smart Cities=2, Consulting=1.5, other=0.5)

top_enriched.name: Dan-George Filimon
top_enriched.outreach_angle: Fellow Zürich AI founder (ex-Google Staff Engineer) building on-device LLMs. Multiplium orchestration layer could serve as infrastructure for Amulet AI pipeline. Reach out as peer, propose Zürich coffee meeting.

top_enriched.name: Penny Schiffer
top_enriched.outreach_angle: AI-powered VC deal sourcing engine — ATX's agent compatibility evaluation could extend Raized.ai's matching layer. Also potential Venturelab introduction chain to Swiss VC funds.

top_enriched.name: Jan Fülscher
top_enriched.outreach_angle: Swiss serial founder and investor at intersection of AI and systematic reasoning. Coffee in Zürich — could yield advisor, investor, or customer. Impact Hub and Top 100 Swiss Startups connected.

top_enriched.name: Jitender Singh Dahiya
top_enriched.outreach_angle: 500+ users in 5 days signal. Fellow AI tools founder — peer outreach for mutual product demo exchange. KroniQ AI user base is potential distribution channel for Nitara or Multiplium integration.

top_enriched.name: Rodolphe Bocquet
top_enriched.outreach_angle: 20+ year ESG expert, former Global Head of ESG at Qontigo and Clarity AI VP. Most strategically connected ESG practitioner in network. Request research conversation on what Swiss SME boards struggle with in ESG reporting — critical validation for Bramha ESG.

top_enriched.name: Johannes Pokorny
top_enriched.outreach_angle: Climate Week Zurich runs 4-9 May 2026 — 10 weeks away. Sponsorship or presentation slot for Bramha ESG at this event reaches Swiss ESG decision-makers. Contact immediately — 8-week lead time for sponsorship decisions.

top_enriched.name: Denis Belkevich
top_enriched.outreach_angle: Just launched AX — AI-powered accelerator for creative tech. Overture (live music community platform) fits the creative tech category. Ask about AX eligibility or investor introduction for Overture.

top_enriched.name: Mariella Reffo
top_enriched.outreach_angle: CEO who successfully closed UBS growth loan and sells SaaS to Swiss municipalities — validate Bramha ESG's SME market entry and pricing via a peer conversation. Recent contact (11 months) — relationship warm.

top_enriched.name: Kevin Sartori
top_enriched.position: Scaling & Growths Advisor to Deep Tech Ventures
top_enriched.outreach_angle: Growth advisor for deep tech ventures. Explore light advisory arrangement for Kavach AI or Multiplium. His advised company portfolio may include clients for Bramha ESG or Kavach AI.

top_enriched.name: Julie Rielle
top_enriched.outreach_angle: Swiss health AI founder. Sentio's sovereign personal AI instrument overlaps with MindHeal's digital mental health focus. Peer conversation on user trust and data sovereignty in health AI.

top_enriched.name: Tommy Fliski
top_enriched.outreach_angle: HIGHEST OPERATIONAL PRIORITY. BD lead at Zürich boutique hotel. AURA's most critical active task is securing one hotel for QR card distribution. Propose a zero-cost pilot partnership. Contact immediately.

top_enriched.name: Ajith Govind Satheesh
top_enriched.outreach_angle: Most recently contacted founder in network (6 months ago). Warm reactivation — request one specific introduction in security or AI space. Low effort, high referral potential.

top_enriched.name: Alexander Ginsburg
top_enriched.outreach_angle: Partnerships lead at Series-A funded Swiss security company (CHF 5M raised) in international expansion. Kavach AI physical security edge layer complements Futurae's digital authentication. Propose integration partnership conversation.

top_enriched.name: Nathalie Manetti
top_enriched.outreach_angle: Venturelab is the central Swiss startup institution. Swiss startups surpassed CHF 2.4B in 2026 funding momentum. Contact with Bramha ESG and Mirari project updates to explore program fit. Potential path to Swiss VC introductions.

top_enriched.name: Leandro Davies
top_enriched.outreach_angle: Zürich startup founder and potential early adopter of Nitara. Low-friction product invite for early access cohort.

top_enriched.name: Armin Agic
top_enriched.outreach_angle: ecoinvent v3.12 just released (Nov 2025) — world's leading LCA database. Data partnership opportunity for Bramha ESG: integrate ecoinvent LCI data as emissions factor backbone. Potential distribution partnership — ecoinvent sells to ESG teams who need compliance tools.

top_enriched.name: Thomas Ackermann
top_enriched.position: Startup Program Manager / ESA BIC Program Manager
top_enriched.outreach_angle: ETH Zürich ESA BIC 2026 cohort just onboarded (AI/robotics focus). Mirari's spatial computing angle may qualify for ESA BIC consideration. Gateway to ETH startup ecosystem for Kavach AI and Bramha ESG enterprise connections.

top_enriched.name: Mathias Vazquez Rodriguez
top_enriched.outreach_angle: HITS (Generali) Innovation Garage has 20 active startups in AI-first solutions. Kavach AI's workplace safety monitoring reduces insurance claims — natural Generali pilot candidate. Bramha ESG relevant for insurer ESG risk data on SME clients.

top_enriched.name: Alex Murawski
top_enriched.outreach_angle: NOA Labs (Berlin/Shenzhen) — 800+ projects, Y-Combinator/HAX alumni network. Hardware partner for Kavach AI edge box development and manufacturing. Reach out referencing December contact.

top_enriched.name: Asha Jomis
top_enriched.outreach_angle: Public policy and governance innovation expert. Advisory conversation for Global Foundation for Transparent Collective Gatherings policy framework. Singapore connection relevant for ATX market entry.
top_enriched.relevant_project: Global Foundation for Transparent Collective Gatherings

Swiss_AI_Founders.description: AI/tech founders based in or connected to Switzerland
Swiss_AI_Founders.opportunity: Peer network for mutual referrals, early adopters for Nitara/Multiplium, and potential advisors/angels

ESG_Sustainability.description: ESG professionals, sustainability practitioners, climate organizations
contacts: Mariella Reffo (Inventsys — serves municipalities with ESG reporting needs)
ESG_Sustainability.opportunity: Validation and distribution for Bramha ESG. Climate Week Zurich is a launch event opportunity.

Swiss_Institutional_Gateways.description: Contacts at Swiss startup support institutions — high leverage for program access and VC introductions
Swiss_Institutional_Gateways.opportunity: Program applications, funding introductions, corporate pilot opportunities worth CHF 50K-500K

Security_Enterprise.description: Security, authentication, and enterprise software contacts
Security_Enterprise.opportunity: Partnership and hardware manufacturing for Kavach AI

VC_Investment.opportunity: Investment conversations for Overture and Kavach AI

Travel_Hospitality.description: Contacts in travel, tourism, or hospitality
Travel_Hospitality.opportunity: AURA hotel distribution partnership — most urgent operational task

network_gaps.description: Zero VC/LP investors in the network who specifically fund Swiss AI or deep tech at seed/Series A stage. Raized.ai (Penny Schiffer) is the closest, but she is a platform, not a direct investor. The network lacks partners at Founderful, Redalpine, Spicehaus, or Forestay — the funds actively deploying in Swiss AI in 2026.
network_gaps.suggested_action: Use the Venturelab connection (Nathalie Manetti) to request warm introductions to 2-3 active Swiss seed funds. Alternatively, apply to Venturelab's Top 100 program which Jan Fülscher is connected to — this creates inbound investor interest.

network_gaps.description: No contacts in Swiss hospitality, tourism boards, or Zürich Tourism organization. AURA's distribution strategy depends on hotel and tourism partnerships, but Green Marmot (Tommy Fliski) is the only hotel contact. Zürich Tourism and the Swiss Tourism Federation are missing entirely.
network_gaps.suggested_action: Identify Zürich Tourism's partnership or product manager. Also research Switzerland Tourism's innovation programs — they have historically run tech partnership programs for destination experiences. Target: 3 hotel BD contacts and 1 Zürich Tourism contact within 30 days.

network_gaps.description: No contacts at Swiss compliance or regulatory bodies (FINMA, BAFU, SECO) relevant for Bramha ESG. ESG compliance in Switzerland is partly driven by FINMA reporting requirements and new EU CSRD compliance. A regulatory insider would accelerate Bramha ESG's compliance framework design.
network_gaps.suggested_action: Target a contact at KPMG Switzerland ESG practice, PwC Switzerland sustainability, or a Swiss cantonal regulatory officer dealing with SME compliance. Rodolphe Bocquet may be able to make a warm introduction into these circles.

network_gaps.description: Significant gap in angel investors and family office contacts who invest in Swiss pre-seed startups. The network has VCs (Denis Belkevich) but no angels who write CHF 25K-100K checks at the concept/prototype stage — where Vimo's projects currently sit.
network_gaps.suggested_action: Join SICTIC (Swiss ICT Investor Club) as a startup presenter — this is how Raized.ai got its first institutional money and is a structured way to present to 200+ Swiss angels simultaneously. Jan Fülscher and Penny Schiffer can likely provide warm introductions to SICTIC.

network_gaps.description: Singapore network is effectively empty. ATX (Agentic Trust Exchange) and Kavach AI both have potential Singapore market entry (AI regulation sandbox, enterprise security market). Only Ashwin Gangappa (NUS Senior Principal Engineer) touches Singapore — not sufficient.
network_gaps.suggested_action: Identify and connect with 3-5 contacts in Singapore's startup ecosystem: Enterprise Singapore, SGInnovate (deep tech), or NUS Enterprise. Ashwin Gangappa (NUS contact) could be leveraged for a warm introduction to NUS Enterprise or SGInnovate.

network_gaps.description: India network (relevant for Kavach AI's primary deployment market) consists mostly of dormant connections from 2012-2018. No current Indian enterprise security or smart cities decision-makers in the active network.
network_gaps.suggested_action: Reactivate 3 India-based contacts from the dormant pool who are in enterprise, tech, or security roles. Ajith Govind Satheesh (Cactus, Aug 2025) is the most recent India-connected contact and can make introductions to Indian startup and enterprise networks.

network_gaps.description: No enterprise sales or channel partnership contacts at major Swiss corporates (ABB, Nestlé, Roche, Novartis, UBS, Credit Suisse successor) who could be pilot customers for Kavach AI or Bramha ESG. All current contacts are founders, advisors, or startup ecosystem players.
network_gaps.suggested_action: Target Head of Innovation, Chief Sustainability Officer, or Head of Corporate Security roles at 2-3 Swiss large enterprises. HITS (via Mathias Vazquez Rodriguez) provides a structured path to Generali as a first enterprise pilot. Climate Week Zurich provides access to Swiss corporate sustainability leads.

key_findings.most_urgent_action: Tommy Fliski (Green Marmot Capsule Hotel) — contact this week to secure the hotel distribution pilot for AURA. This directly completes a critical active validation task that is blocking the build decision.
key_findings.highest_revenue_potential: Rodolphe Bocquet (ESG4Boards) — a 30-minute conversation with him validates or kills Bramha ESG's market thesis. His institutional network could open CHF 50K+ in early customers within 90 days if the thesis is correct.
key_findings.best_multiplier: Nathalie Manetti (Venturelab) — one conversation unlocks access to Swiss VC funding pipeline, institutional programs, and startup ecosystem introductions. CHF 2.4B+ is being deployed in Swiss startups in 2026.
key_findings.ai_cluster_signal: Three AI founders in Zürich were contacted in early 2025 (Dan-George Filimon, Julie Rielle) and April 2025 (Jan Fülscher, Penny Schiffer). This is not coincidental — Vimo was clearly active in the Zürich AI founder community during that period. Reactivating all four this week as a cluster would rebuild that momentum.

notes: Confidence score reflects that the full 1801-contact database could not be enumerated due to file size constraints. The analysis covers the 94 most recently active contacts (2024-2025) plus all identified Founder/CEO/CTO contacts. The remaining ~1700 contacts are predominantly older (pre-2023) connections — likely lower-value given recency decay — but may contain hidden gems not captured in this analysis. A full Python-based triage pass on the complete dataset is recommended as a follow-up task to identify any high-value dormant contacts in the uncovered population.
